text:
<@U058ZPH175H> I tried that as well, just after I published my post, intrigued myself by what you've spotted in that example, but nothing changed.
I also tried various combinations using the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#render|render filter>, in order to have the value early to pass it to other filters... nothing.
I'm flabbergasted :sweat_smile:

Using filters or functions in conjunction with personalization tokens is just generally unreliable, when you’re working with emails. I haven’t determined any rhyme or reason as to when it works or when it doesn’t.

Sometimes, calling the `render` filter will help, so long as it’s called first. However, that’s far from reliable.
